segments.text: Your PC is so amazing . Are you doing trade on internet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for your compliment . I bought this PC with my first-month salary . I am getting to know the on-line trade .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm wondering if you often trade with others on the internet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I often do business through internet now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , really ? Is it a good way ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , very gorgeous . Sometimes , I can deal with my business without stepping out of our house .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Firstly , it is convenient . And secondly , it has low cost , because you know you only need to pay the fee of internet service .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I agree with you . It will cost too much when going abroad to join the exhibition .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The most important is that it is very convenient . You know you can browse the website and send E-mails to your customers at any time . Even you can have e-contract with your regular customers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So cool , if we do business through other ways , it will cost a lot of time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , but every coin has two sides . Doing business through the internet is not as safe as doing business through traditional ways .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will you give me some suggestion ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , such as Alabama , which is a famous website .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . Maybe I will do business through internet in the future .
segments.speaker: S1
